Title: Relates to proof of identity for driver's licenses; repealer
Summary: Authorizes valid, unexpired national identity cards to be included as acceptable proofs of age and identity for applications for driver's licenses.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, rpld ยง502 sub 1, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to allowing national identity cards to be included as acceptable proofs of age and identity for applications for driver's licenses; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
